attributes.action: To prevent any more reorganisation of the NHS without the full input of all its employees.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people are fed up with what they see as change for the sake of change. It seems that a re-organisation occurs every time a new Health Minister is appointed.
The best people to identify where, when and how change should occur are surely the people affected by the change, those that do the job!
